TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ReadOnlyCollection`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public Class ReadOnlyCollection(Of T) Implements ICollection(Of T), IEnumerable(Of T), IList, IList(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T), IReadOnlyList(Of T)

generic <typename T> public ref class ReadOnlyCollection : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IList<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyList<T>, System::Collections::IList

type ReadOnlyCollection<'T> = class interface IList<'T> interface IList interface IReadOnlyList<'T> interface ICollection<'T> interface seq<'T> interface IEnumerable interface ICollection interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T>

span.span: The type of elements in the collection.

summary.span: 提供泛型唯讀集合的基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for a generic read-only collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體泛型類別永遠是唯讀的。An instance of the generic class is always read-only. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 請參閱這個類別的可修改版本。See for a modifiable version of this class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的數個成員類別。The following code example demonstrates several members of the class. 程式碼範例會建立的字串和四個恐龍名稱加入至其中。The code example creates a of strings and adds four dinosaur names to it. 程式碼範例接著會包裝的清單中。The code example then wraps the list in a . 之後示範， ， ，和成員，在程式碼範例顯示是只要原始包裝函式加至新的項目和顯示內容的。After demonstrating the , , , and members, the code example shows that the is just a wrapper for the original by adding a new item to the and displaying the contents of the . 最後，程式碼範例會建立陣列大於集合，並使用方法，將集合的項目插入陣列的中間。Finally, the code example creates an array larger than the collection and uses the method to insert the elements of the collection into the middle of the array. [!code-cpp[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/vb/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 (在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: A可以支援多個讀取器同時，只要未修改集合。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 即便如此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

span.para: 這個基底類別可讓實作器建立泛型唯讀自訂集合更容易。實作者都來擴充這個而不是建立自己的基底類別。
This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a generic read-only custom collection. Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is a read-only wrapper around the specified list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免的任何修改`list`，公開`list`只能透過這個包裝函式。To prevent any modifications to `list`, expose `list` only through this wrapper. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範這個建構函式，以及數個成員的類別。The following code example demonstrates this constructor and several members of the class. 程式碼範例會建立的字串和四個恐龍名稱加入至其中。The code example creates a of strings and adds four dinosaur names to it. 程式碼範例接著會包裝的清單中藉由傳遞建構函式。The code example then wraps the list in a by passing it to the constructor. 之後示範， ， ，和成員，在程式碼範例顯示是只要原始包裝函式加至新的項目和顯示內容的。After demonstrating the , , , and members, the code example shows that the is just a wrapper for the original by adding a new item to the and displaying the contents of the . 最後，程式碼範例會建立陣列大於集合，並使用方法，將集合的項目插入陣列的中間。Finally, the code example creates an array larger than the collection and uses the method to insert the elements of the collection into the middle of the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會決定使用的預設相等比較子的等號比較。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer . 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的數個成員類別。The following code example demonstrates several members of the class. 程式碼範例會建立的字串和四個恐龍名稱加入至其中。The code example creates a of strings and adds four dinosaur names to it. 程式碼範例接著會包裝的清單中。The code example then wraps the list in a . 之後示範， ， ，和成員，在程式碼範例顯示是只要原始包裝函式加至新的項目和顯示內容的。After demonstrating the , , , and members, the code example shows that the is just a wrapper for the original by adding a new item to the and displaying the contents of the . 最後，程式碼範例會建立陣列大於集合，並使用方法，將集合的項目插入陣列的中間。Finally, the code example creates an array larger than the collection and uses the method to insert the elements of the collection into the middle of the array. summary.span: 傳回在 中逐一查看的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` Visual c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的內容使用的列舉值包裝。The following code example uses the enumerator to display the contents of a that wraps a . 列舉值已隱藏起來，並且由`foreach`陳述式 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中`for each`c + + 中)。The enumerator is concealed by the `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++). [!code-cpp[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[generic.ReadOnlyCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/generic.ReadOnlyCollection/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋向前第一個項目開始和結束時間的最後一個元素。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 這個方法會判斷等號比較使用預設比較子。This method determines equality using the default comparer . 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供可以使用下列 C# 語法存取集合中的特定元素的能力： `myCollection[index]` (`myCollection(index)`在 Visual Basic 中)。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following C# syntax: `myCollection[index]` (`myCollection(index)` in Visual Basic). C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的數個成員類別。The following code example demonstrates several members of the class. 程式碼範例會建立的字串和四個恐龍名稱加入至其中。The code example creates a of strings and adds four dinosaur names to it. 程式碼範例接著會包裝的清單中。The code example then wraps the list in a . 之後示範， ， ，和成員，在程式碼範例顯示是只要原始包裝函式加至新的項目和顯示內容的。After demonstrating the , , , and members, the code example shows that the is just a wrapper for the original by adding a new item to the and displaying the contents of the . 最後，程式碼範例會建立陣列大於集合，並使用方法，將集合的項目插入陣列的中間。Finally, the code example creates an array larger than the collection and uses the method to insert the elements of the collection into the middle of the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果來源類型無法自動轉換成目的地類型`array`，非泛型實作擲回，而泛型實作擲回。If the type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination `array`, the non-generic implementations of throw , whereas the generic implementations throw . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的預設實作中，這個屬性一律會傳回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 傳回的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 在 的預設實作中，這個屬性一律會傳回目前的執行個體。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() cil managed
Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator Implements IEnumerable.GetEnumerator

summary.span: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.
An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` Visual c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否有固定的大小。

value.span: 在 的預設實作中，這個屬性一律會傳回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是唯讀的集合只以防止新增或移除項目; 包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. C# 語言使用[這](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md)關鍵字定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the [this](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this.md) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
